choices.name: ConfidentialChoice
choices.choiceText: Confidential Waste - Paper and Media that requires secure destruction.

choices.name: DryMixedRecyclingChoice
choices.choiceText: Dry Mixed Recycling - Clean & Dry Paper, Cans, Plastic Bottles and Cardboard.

choices.name: EuroBinContainerChoice
choices.choiceText:
Euro Bins - Suitable for small items of compactable waste in smaller volumes.

{!EuroBinIconImage}

choices.name: FELContainerChoice
choices.choiceText:
FEL Containers - Suitable for small items of compactable waste in larger volumes.

{!FELIconImage}

choices.name: FoodWasteChoice
choices.choiceText: Food Waste - Cooked and Raw food waste, egg shells and coffee grounds. No food packaging.

choices.name: GeneralWasteChoice
choices.choiceText: General Waste – Waste that cannot be recycled.

choices.name: GlassChoice
choices.choiceText: Glass - Waste glass bottles, and containers. No window frames.

choices.name: ROROContainerChoice
choices.choiceText:
RORO - Larger container for bulkier items such as broken furniture or mono streams like wood or metal.

{!ROROIconImage}

choices.name: SackServiceContainerChoice
choices.choiceText:
Sack Service – Loose bag collection for premises that do not have space for a bin.

{!SecureSackIconImage}

choices.name: SkipContainerChoice
choices.choiceText:
Skip - For bulkier items such as broken furniture or mono streams like wood or metal.

{!SkipIconImage}

choices.name: WEEEChoice
choices.choiceText: Other - Including WEEE, Haz Waste and Clinical, please provide further details in the description field.

fields.name: CaseCreatedScreenHeader
fields.fieldText: Request a new service

fields.name: ConfirmationText
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for submitting your request. We will be in touch with you shortly to confirm details of your request.


Case Number: {!GetCase.CaseNumber}

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid postcode including spaces.

fields.name: DescriptionTextArea
fields.helpText: Help us to help you. Please share any further information that you think might be useful to our team.

value.stringValue: Would you like to request another service at this site?

fields.name: FileUploadScreenHeader
fields.fieldText: Request a new service

fields.name: File_Upload_Text
fields.fieldText: As you are requesting services for multiple sites please upload this information and we will be in touch.

fields.name: Screen1Header
fields.fieldText: Request a new service

fields.name: How_many_sites_are_you_requesting_services_for
fields.fieldText: How many sites are you requesting services for?
